goal.ch:
“課程目標：
本課程為傳統歷史系課程史學導論的數位人版，強調結合數位人文資料庫與技術，啟發學生既有歷史學的基本訓練，也帶入最新的數位人文知識，讓學生對新時代的歷史學有新一層的認識，並能依據所學技術以特展方式呈現出數位史學特色。除了以當代歷史學的趨勢為主題，帶領學生認識歷史學在研究什麼？史家怎麼進行研究？透過哪些方法在進行研究。更透過這十個趨勢，帶出來本課程的重點【數位史學】。其次簡介CBDB、HGIS、DocuSky等工具，引導學生認識歷史學如何透過這些工具進行歷史研究。
(1) 第一部分以當代歷史學的趨勢為主題，帶領學生認識歷史學在研究什麼？史家怎麼進行研究？透過哪些方法在進行研究。透過這十個趨勢，帶出來本課程的重點【數位史學】。其次簡介CBDB、HGIS、DocuSky等工具，引導學生認識歷史學如何透過這些工具進行歷史研究。
(2) 第二部分則透過專家講座，帶領學生認識數位史學的應用，重點將在前述這幾項工具的應用成果。
(3)第三部分則透過課程實作方式帶領學生設計課題、研究課題，這部分透過二戰與日記為焦點，訓練同學從日記中描繪書主人翁的歷史活動軌跡、日常生活、空間地圖及關鍵詞標記。“
goal.en:
“Course objectives:
This course is a digital version of the introduction to the history of the traditional history department curriculum, emphasizing the combination of digital humanities database and technology, inspiring students to have the basic training of history, but also bring the latest digital humanities knowledge, so that students can learn about the history of the new era There is a new level of understanding, and can present digital historiography features in special exhibitions based on the techniques learned. In addition to taking the trend of contemporary history as the theme, leading students to understand what history is studying? How does the historian conduct research? What methods are being used for research. Through these ten trends, the focus of this course [Digital History] is brought out. Secondly, introduce tools such as CBDB, HGIS, DocuSky, etc. to guide students to understand how history studies historical research through these tools.

(1) The first part takes the trend of contemporary history as the theme, leading students to understand what history is studying? How does the historian conduct research? What methods are being used for research. Through these ten trends, the focus of this course [Digital History] is brought out. Secondly, introduce tools such as CBDB, HGIS, DocuSky, etc. to guide students to understand how history studies historical research through these tools.
(2) The second part will lead students to understand the application of digital historiography through expert lectures. The focus will be on the application results of the aforementioned tools.
(3) The third part guides students to design topics and research topics through the implementation of the course. This part uses WWII and diary as the focus to train students to draw from the diary the historical activities of the book owner, daily life, space map and keywords mark.“
